thread.title: John W. Killingsworth, PMP Joins Atwell

author: cnbc.com
title: John W. Killingsworth, PMP Joins Atwell
text:
TULSA, Okla.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Consulting, engineering and construction services firm Atwell, LLC is pleased to welcome John W. Killingsworth, PMP to our team as Vice President of Operations, Oil & Gas. Killingsworth is responsible for launching Atwell’s Tulsa, Oklahoma operation as well as growing Atwell’s pipeline integrity and maintenance programs across the country.
This press release features multimedia. View the full release here: https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180403006147/en/
John W. Killingsworth, PMP (Photo: Business Wire)
Killingsworth brings more than 24 years of experience in project and program management with an emphasis in providing Field Services for EPCM pipeline and facilities projects, as well as, Operations and Maintenance programs. He has diverse managerial and strategic planning skills with proven ability in business development, project management, operations management, knowledge management and contract administration.
Killingsworth earned his Bachelor of Science degree in Business, Marketing at Oklahoma City University. He is a certified Project Management Professional (PMP) and a member of Project Management Institute of Tulsa (PMI), Knowledge & Information Professional Association (KIPA), and Pipe Liners Club of Tulsa. He is also an active volunteer in his community.
“We are excited to have John join our team. His leadership skills and project management experience will make him a great asset to the company,” says Matt Bissett, Vice President.
Atwell continues to grow its presence in the Oil & Gas sector. With this strategic hire and the team that is being built across the United States, Atwell is becoming the provider of choice for Upstream and Midstream Operating companies looking to build new and expand existing infrastructure or in need of support to help maintain their existing assets.
Atwell, LLC is a national consulting, engineering and construction services firm with over five hundred professionals across the country that deliver a broad range of strategic and creative solutions to clients in a variety of industries including real estate and land development, power and energy, and oil and gas. They provide comprehensive turnkey services including land and ROW support, planning, landscape architecture, engineering, land surveying, environmental science, and project and program management.
View source version on businesswire.com : https://www.businesswire.com/news/home/20180403006147/en/
ATWELL, LLC
Timothy Augustine, Senior Vice President
